Articles.Content:
Hi! Me is Crocket (yes, I meant to say me is Crocket), and I've had KSP for quite some time (although I can't remember for how long). I have a question for you guys, unfortunately.

  1. I transferred the ksp-win folder to my desktop, and apparently model 000 for the Mark 16-XL broke! Will my game still be playable if the model actually broke?

I'm really looking forward to posting on this forum!

If it's just the one part, you might be okay. However, I'd suggest downloading the game again, or deleting it and unzipping your download again. You can move your save and settings files into the new copy and continue where you left off.
Thanks! The KSP download took forever, so I think I just won't ever use the 16-XL.
